snippet.title: StaudSoft's Synthetic World: New Sign
snippet.description:
Finally I also added new amazing signs. They can be placed anywhere in any direction.

And extra for you I added basic HTML support. So you can change the font color, use a bold or italic font, change the font size and even use enumerations.

Centering the text, new line and word wrap is of course also supported!

Buy it today and save money: http://www.desura.com/games/staudsofts-synthetic-world

Homepage: http://www.staudsoft.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MichaelStaud
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/staudsofts-synthetic-world
Steam:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=244364760
Gamejolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/rpg/staudsoft-s-synthetic-world/19813/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/StaudSoft/286830941415244?ref=hl
Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/staudsoftofficial
